title: Citrix ADC Gateway RCE: CVE-2023-3519 is Exploitable, and 53% of Servers Are Unpatched
summary: Bishop Fox developed an exploit for CVE-2023-3519, a stack overflow in Citrix ADC Gateway that allows remote code execution.

title: Compromised Microsoft Key: More Impactful Than We Thought
summary: Our investigation of the security incident disclosed by Microsoft and CISA and attributed to Chinese threat actor Storm-0558, found that this incident seems to have a broader scope than originally assumed.
